m_guestComments.comment: This is a huge one. Wondering if this is the actual size or is it because it's not carefully calibrated in VR?
I think it is the actual size. I have an impression of seeing this somewhere

m_curatorComment.comment: The statue of a giant lion stands majestically, its muscular body poised in a powerful stance, with a mane that flows dramatically around its fierce face. Its eyes are set forward, exuding a commanding presence, as it seems to guard the space around it with an air of royal authority.
